entityA.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='400' height='400' viewBox='0 0 400 400'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='150' fill='#ffcc00' class='body'/><rect x='180' y='120' width='40' height='60' fill='#99cc00' class='arms'/><rect x='160' y='210' width='80' height='30' fill='#99cc00' class='legs'/><polygon points='200,80 240,120 160,120' fill='#9966cc' class='tail'/><circle cx='180' cy='180' r='10' fill='#ffffff' class='eyes'/><path d='M170,190 Q200,160 230,190' fill='none' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='3' class='mouth'/></svg>

report.appearance: EntityA has a round yellow body with green arms, legs, and a purple tail. It has white eyes and a smiling mouth.
report.reason: This evolution emphasizes agility and balance in movement.
report.thought: EntityA feels lighter and more flexible, ready to explore new environments.

entityB.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='400' height='400' viewBox='0 0 400 400'><rect x='150' y='150' width='100' height='100' fill='#3399ff' class='body'/><circle cx='130' cy='140' r='20' fill='#ff6666' class='eyes'/><path d='M150,170 Q200,150 250,170' fill='none' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='3' class='mouth'/><rect x='160' y='130' width='20' height='50' fill='#ff6666' class='arms'/><rect x='220' y='130' width='20' height='50' fill='#ff6666' class='arms'/><rect x='160' y='200' width='20' height='50' fill='#ff6666' class='legs'/><rect x='220' y='200' width='20' height='50' fill='#ff6666' class='legs'/><polygon points='200,250 210,270 190,270' fill='#ff6666' class='tail'/></svg>

report.appearance: EntityB now has a blue rectangular body with red eyes and mouth. It has red arms, legs, and a red tail.
report.reason: This evolution emphasizes strength and stability for various tasks.
report.thought: EntityB feels robust and powerful, ready to take on challenges ahead.
